title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-hosted LLM runner with a simple CLI and REST API, supports Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list models with a few lines.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package giving Ollama models as LLM, chat and embedding backends.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, multi-user, dark mode, mobile).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async, streaming, model management, Android compatible.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama—chat, generate and pull models idiomatically.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper with chat history, syntax highlighting and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension turning Ollama models into inline code copilot with autocomplete.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama—use local models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Camunda 8 connector that calls Ollama REST API for human-task completions or scripting.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Community n8n node to add Ollama chat & generate steps in no-code workflows.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama API.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain to chat with PDFs.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin that sends selected blocks to Ollama for summarization or Q&A.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Production-ready Docker Compose stack with Ollama, WebUI, GPU support and Nginx.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector and PVC.

title: ollama-rails
summary: Ruby on Rails wrapper gem—adds ActiveModel-like interface to Ollama chat/generate.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that chats or generates code using any Ollama model.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Lightweight Slack bot server that answers questions via Ollama with streaming replies.
